list: Such that you can ask them to recall it at a later moment.
args.time_seconds: number: The time they get for memorizing. An hourglass will display this to them.

args.question: Put this open question somewhere else in the game. Ask for the list back
args.correct_answer: same list as before, but now just comma separated or something (just for you to correct their answers with).
args.point_reward: number: points given for answering correctly
